title: How to Draw a Caveman

steps.headline: Sketch in a skeleton/pose for the caveman.
steps.description: We'll portray him as a slouched muscular man.

steps.headline: Draw a circle for the head and add in guidelines.
Draw a large oval for the body and long muscular arms and hands.
Sketch in small but muscular legs and feet.
Sketch in clothes and a club if you want, and also add in details like facial features and body hair.
Outline our primitive man and erase guidelines.
Color it up and you're done!

text: Sketch in a skeleton/pose for the caveman. We'll portray him as a slouched muscular man. Draw a circle for the head and add in guidelines.  Draw a large oval for the body and long muscular arms and hands.  Sketch in small but muscular legs and feet.  Sketch in clothes and a club if you want, and also add in details like facial features and body hair.  Outline our primitive man and erase guidelines.  Color it up and you're done! Uga uga HWOOH!
sentences: Sketch in a skeleton/pose for the caveman.
We'll portray him as a slouched muscular man.
Draw a circle for the head and add in guidelines.
Draw a large oval for the body and long muscular arms and hands.
Sketch in small but muscular legs and feet.
Sketch in clothes and a club if you want, and also add in details like facial features and body hair.
Outline our primitive man and erase guidelines.
Color it up and you're done!
